text:
29th St. Publishing (29.io) in New York City is looking for an Engineering Manager and a Senior Product Designer.

A little bit about us:

29th Street Publishing is building a mobile app platform that changes the way publishers produce, showcase, distribute, and monetize their work. Mobile app design is an always-evolving practice — we are constantly reinventing new ways to distribute and frame content, which requires deep collaboration across our design and engineering teams. At its best, our work disappears into the background and allows the publisher’s own content to shine.

More details can be found here: http://29.io/jobs
